3f032005-2bff-41a8-810a-e534061d771d.description: This badge is awarded to our members completing the highest level of technical engagement. Earners must complete the Microsoft Sentinel Ninja training AND earn the Microsoft Sentinel Influencer badge to receive this recognition.

Microsoft Sentinel Ninja Certification

Earners must complete the Microsoft Sentinel Ninja training AND have earned the Microsoft Sentinel Influencer to receive this recognition. Our team will be notified once you have achieved your ninja certificate.

cdcdffe8-57b5-4727-90a4-e2c1018294eb.description: Microsoft Cloud Security Product Champion influences our product features by providing in-depth technical knowledge and feedback to MS security products. cdcdffe8-57b5-4727-90a4-e2c1018294eb.name: Cloud Security Product Champion

d17a9562-07ad-4c22-b3f7-c2016e53dcfb.name: Defender for Cloud Black Belt

4f250d6f-500d-46e8-bdcd-ee010792b306.description: Two or more members from the same organization must complete at least 30 credits collectively participating in qualifying engagements in the community. Members receiving this award must already have earned their Cloud Security Product Champion Award.
4f250d6f-500d-46e8-bdcd-ee010792b306.name: Cloud Security Rockstar Team

badge_template_activities.title: Earners must be a member of the Microsoft Cloud Security Private Community.
Earners must have earned their Microsoft Cloud Security Product Champion Award

66f25ca3-3cad-4c26-9306-2d78c9b0cd95.description: The Microsoft Sentinel Influencer badge is awarded to members of our community who have demonstrated their skills and provided in-depth technical knowledge and feedback on MS Sentinel product features with significant impact.

1ff86301-9fc5-4b09-8069-19cc6e371167.description: The Customer Champion Award is given to the top 3 monthly earners. Customers with the most engagement credits for the month of March will be awarded this badge.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners must be a member of the Microsoft Cloud Security Private Community.

c98ae388-ad59-4e0b-beb3-087f4e3f8b76.description: This badge is awarded to Microsoft Management Customer Connection Program (MM CCP) members that are not only part of this community, but contribute through knowledge sharing, feedback, and engagement.
c98ae388-ad59-4e0b-beb3-087f4e3f8b76.name: Microsoft Management Community Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Be a member of the Microsoft Management CCP Community
Participate to earn at least 5 credits in the Microsoft Management CCP Community

3c4db614-bf81-4935-b145-73ce77615e39.description: This badge is awarded to Microsoft Management Connection Program (MM CCP) members that influence engineers and peers through knowledge sharing, feedback, and engagement.
3c4db614-bf81-4935-b145-73ce77615e39.name: Microsoft Management Community Influencer

badge_template_activities.title: Be a member of the Microsoft Management CCP Community.
Earn 15 or more credits in our community across any of our products.

The Microsoft Management Connection Program (MM CCP) engages enterprise IT Pro customers who are excited to work directly with Windows engineering throughout the planning and development cycle, long before a solution or feature is released. Our customers help engineers build the right thing, the right way, as fast as possible.

b4579239-fc7d-4966-9655-0977cfe25e6a.description: The Microsoft Management Customer Connection Program: Community Leader digital badge validates an earner's commitment to go above and beyond to provide ongoing, consistent, and deep technical feedback to Windows and Intune engineers. Earners of this badge are of the top community leaders in the Customer Connection Program.
b4579239-fc7d-4966-9655-0977cfe25e6a.name: Microsoft Management Community Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Be a member of the Microsoft Management CCP Community
Earn 50 or more credits participating in private previews, live calls, surveys and more in the Microsoft Management CCP Community.

946a54e6-c3b6-4fb9-97a7-5cc65b948a43.description: The Network Security Champion badge is awarded to Cloud Security Private Community members who have demonstrated their skills and provided in-depth technical knowledge and feedback on Network Security product features.
